description:
Light yet warm, the Backcountry socks provide cushioning and warmth for all-mountain winter activities. Mesh zones vent heat and assist with moisture management to keep your feet comfortable and blister-free for long days in your boots.

  • Merino wool and Tencel™ blend regulates foot temperature and moves sweat away from your skin
  • Merino wool is naturally antimicrobial to resist odours
  • Mulesed-free merino wool
  • Movement support on arch and ankle allows the sock to move with you
  • Mesh ventilation for maximum breathability and dryness
  • Flat toe seams won’t irritate
name: Kombi Backcountry Ski Socks - Unisex
